author: IGN
description: You know the one. Here's the infamous ladder scene from MGS3 recreated in Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, played on PC on a GeForce RTX 5090.
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater - Iconic Ladder Scene in 4K

author: IGN
description:
Metal Gear Solid 3 is an all-time classic for many reasons, one of them being its huge list of cool and interesting things that Snake can do that aren't explicity taught in any sort of tutorial. So if you're looking to steath in style, or need some extra tips that don't exactly cover the fundamentals, here is a breakdown of 14 things that Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, doesn't tell you.

Timecodes: 
00:00 - Intro
00:54 - Film Reels
01:25 - How Much Camo Do You Need
02:13 - Your Hunger Can Get You Spotted
02:44 - Your Sonar Makes a Loud Noise
03:02 - The Stalking Button
04:23 - The Different States of Alert
06:00 - Using the Environment
07:00 - Your Food Will Go Bad
08:12 - Stepping in Mud or Water Will Leave Prints
08:37 - Suppressors Can Break
09:02 - You Can Destroy Enemy Radios
09:29 - Shaking Enemies For Items
10:08 - Knocked Out Enemies Can Wake Up
10:54 - Croc Cap Lets You Swim Undetected

#IGN #Gaming
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater - 14 Things it Doesn't Tell You

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at gameplay and more from Wizordum in this latest trailer for the retro-inspired fantasy FPS game. Wizordum will be available on Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), and Nintendo Switch on September 23, 2025. It is out now on PC.

Step into the boots of a powerful mage and explore vibrant, fast-paced levels that fuse classic ’90s shooters like DOOM, Hexen, Heretic, and Wolfenstein 3D with modern gameplay, polish, and replayability. Journey through sprawling levels filled with traps, puzzles, minecart mayhem, and deadly enemies, armed with an arsenal of magic weapons like the Faewood Crossbow, explosive Poison Vials, the elemental Staff of Chaos, and the devastating Grimoire.
title: Wizordum - Official Console Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss 'The War for Our World Begins' Trailer for Tron: Ares, a sci-fi drama action film distributed by Walt Disney Pictures. Get familiar with Ares, the AI-powered military unit, often referred to as "The Ultimate Soldier". Tron: Ares releases in theaters on October 10.

A highly sophisticated Program, Ares, is sent from the digital world into the real world on a dangerous mission.

Tron: Ares stars Greta Lee, Sarah Desjardins, Gillian Anderson, Jared Leto, Evan Peters, Jeff Bridges, Cameron Monaghan, Jodie Turner-Smith, and more. The film is written by Jesse Wigutow, Jack Thorne, and Steven Lisberger with Joachim Rønning directing Tron: Ares.

Tron: Ares releases in theaters on October 10.
title: Tron: Ares - Official 'The War for Our World Begins' Teaser Trailer (2025) Jared Leto, Greta Lee

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Harlowe 'Family Reunion' Character Story Trailer for Borderlands 4, the next installment in the first-person looter shooter franchise developed by Gearbox. Players can get familiar with Harlowe, a former Maliwan combat scientist who makes effective use of her curiosity and smarts to get the job done. Take a look at the latest story trailer as Harlowe engages in a high-speed chase to take back what's rightfully hers when a relative steps in to attempt to stop her, leading to a fatal outcome. Play as Harlowe in Borderlands 4, launching on September 12 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam), with a release on Nintendo Switch 2 on October 3.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Borderlands 4 - Official Harlowe 'Family Reunion' Character Story Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Exclusive PlayStation Launch Trailer for Zoochosis, a bodycam horror simulation game developed by Clapperheads. Players will interact with animals and care for their well-being as an infection spreads across the zoo. Discern which animals are healthy or infected while staying alive in the process. Zoochosis is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4) and PlayStation 5 (PS5), alongside the game being available now for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Zoochosis - Exclusive PlayStation Launch Trailer

author: IGN
title: Borderlands 4 brings a darker tone to the series! Presented by @BorderlandsGame

author: IGN
description:
IGN's Max Scoville got sent to the Kairos booth at gamescom 2025 thanks to some Timekeeper shenanigans. Fortunately, there were plenty of cool things to see and do. And with Borderlands 4 coming to PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X | S on September 12th and Nintendo Switch 2 on October 3rd -- you've got time to prepare for your stay on Kairos!

Presented by Borderlands 4.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Borderlands 4's Kairos Booth & Game Story Overview | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a development status update on Replaced, the long-anticipated 2.5D pixel-art cyberpunk action-adventure game, straight from game director Yura Zhdanovich at Sad Cat Studios. Replaced will be released for PC and Xbox Series X|S (and also day one on Xbox Game Pass) in Spring 2026. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1663850/REPLACED/ 

And don't miss our new hands-on preview of Replaced. Spoiler alert: we are blown away: https://youtu.be/UAV3VdhixLE?si=LN8fbfsJShthw7RH
title: Replaced: Official Development Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Harlowe Abilities Breakdown: Beyond the Borderlands #9 for Borderlands 4, the upcoming addition to the hit first-person looter shooter developed by Gearbox. Players can get the rundown on Harlowe's kit from being a former Maliwan combat scientist. Harlowe is able to make quick use of enemies with her crowd-control abilities and area-of-effect capabilities of her class. Learn more about Harlowe here on the latest Beyond the Borderlands episode for Borderlands 4, launching on September 12 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam), with the game launching on October 3 for Nintendo Switch 2.

#Borderlands4 #Harlowe #Gaming
title: Borderlands 4 - Official Harlowe Abilities Breakdown: Beyond the Borderlands #9 Video

author: IGN
description:
Peacemaker and the gang are headed to DC Worlds Collide. Watch the latest DC Worlds Collide trailer for the mobile RPG for the Peacemaker Season announcement. Peacemaker Season arrives in DC Worlds Collide on August 28, 2025 (UTC).

#Peacemaker #DCWorldsCollide #Gaming
title: DC Worlds Collide: Peacemaker Season - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Shinobi: Art of Vengeance reviewed by Tristan Ogilvie on PlayStation 5. Also available on Xbox Series X|S, PC, PlayStation 4, and Nintendo Switch.

"Off the back of 2017’s Wonder Boy: The Dragon’s Trap and 2020’s Streets of Rage 4, developer Lizardcube had already proven itself to be a safe pair of hands when it comes to resurrecting classic Sega series’, and Shinobi: Art of Vengeance has only further cemented its reputation as a studio capable of making everything old feel new again. This is a genuinely engaging 2D action platformer, beautiful to behold and even better to play. It’s blessed with a combat system that expands in an invigorating way, as well as a healthy amount of secret side objectives that offer some serious optional challenges outside of the main story path. Like a ninja strapped onto a surfboard, Shinobi: Art of Vengeance is eyecatching, deadly, and totally rad as hell."
title: Shinobi: Art of Vengeance Review
